title: (x) Simple sans caps on Korres packaging - FF DIN {Simon H}
content:
hi there- any thoughts on what face is on all the korres packaging? i feel like it’s a DIN family, but not sure. sorry for the photo- it was the best i could find.

author: kellyleigh

comments.content: Maybe DIN medium with a slight vertical ’squoosh’.
better not have sqooshed the type. thanks- i guess maybe i just needed a second opnion.

hi,

it really looks like _ff din light_ by albert jan pool.

ulli.

Woops, they’re using the regular. Sorry.
